title: Mobile Microlearning Course for Agricultural R&D Innovation

context.prior_knowledge: Basic agricultural techniques and understanding of research methodologies
context.additional_context: A course for learners in managerial/leadership roles to learn immediately applicable agricultural technology innovations in the field

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more problem-solving strategies using digital technologies in agricultural R&D fields
Learners can complete over 80% of microlearning content provided through mobile platforms and pass formative assessments
Learners can perform knowledge-sharing activities with peer learners using digital collaboration tools at least once weekly
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
